verses.roman:
devāsurāhava-hatā
daiteyā ye su-dāruṇāḥ
te cotpannā manuṣyeṣu
prajā dṛptā babādhire

synonyms: deva-asura—among the demigods and demons; āhava—in wars; hatāḥ—killed; daiteyāḥ—demons; ye—who; su—very; dāruṇāḥ—ferocious; te—they; ca—and; utpannāḥ—arose; manuṣyeṣu—among human beings; prajāḥ—the populace; dṛptāḥ—arrogant; babādhire—they troubled.
translation: The savage descendants of Diti who had been killed in past ages in battles between the demigods and demons took birth among human beings and arrogantly harassed the general populace.
